testdescription: Verify user is able to place the path of the file that the record was read from
Verify in the Split Size field the default value should be 128MB.
To Verify in the Split Size field the value less than 128MB.
To Verify in the Split Size field the value greater than128MB.
To Verify by passing the blank value in path field
Verify by selecting the different File Format from actual file in file format drop down menu
Verify the GCS properties of valid File Format of the data to read listed below:  CSV file AVRO file BLOB file TSV file Delimeted file JSON file Parquet File Text file

Verfiy the below data types supported in GCS: Integer                                         Float                                         string                                         Boolean                                                                                  See io.cdap.cdap.api.data.schema.Schema.Type and io.cdap.cdap.api.data.schema.Schema.LogicalType                                         Current list                                         Type:                                         NULL(true),                                         BOOLEAN(true),                                         INT(true),                                         LONG(true),                                         FLOAT(true),        1.4                                 DOUBLE(true),                                         BYTES(true),                                         STRING(true),                                                                                  ENUM(false),                                                                                  ARRAY(false),                                         MAP(false),                                         RECORD(false),                                         UNION(false);                                                                                  LogicalType:                                         DATE(Type.INT, "date"),                                         TIMESTAMP_MILLIS(Type.LONG, "timestamp-millis"),                                         TIMESTAMP_MICROS(Type.LONG, "timestamp-micros"),                                         TIME_MILLIS(Type.INT, "time-millis"),                                         TIME_MICROS(Type.LONG, "time-micros"),                                         DECIMAL(Type.BYTES, "decimal"),                                         DATETIME(Type.STRING, "datetime");                                                                                  Each type must be checked for "nullable" and "non-null"                                         Decimal must be checked for various setting of precision and scale, including edge ones                                         Double/Float must be checked for special cases (INF, NAN, ...)
To verify the browse button functionality by selecting the path of the file through browse button
To verify the output of get schema by using browse button functionality
To verify the output of get schema without using browse button functionality, direcltly place the path
Verify the GCS properties of Delimeter field if the file format is delimeted
Verify the GCS properties of Overrride field by placing the column and data type to be override, data type supported:  Bytes double float  Int long string date time timestamp boolean
Verify the various combinations in override field:  Int to double double to float  Int to long Int to boolean
To verify the invalid format of data types in override field
To verify Get schema button to validate output schema
To verify Skip header button with true value and validate the schema that header should skipped
To verify Skip header button with false value and validate the schema that header should not be skipped
In the credentials verify service account type field by selecting filepath radio button
In the credentials verify service account type field by selecting JSON radio button
To verify Regex path filter by validating regular expression for files to read
In path field put the path of the file and verify that if output field to contain the path of the object that was read from
Verify the path field name only field with true value to check whether to use file name only instead of URI
Verify the GCS properties of Read files recursively field with true or false value
Verify the GCS properties of Data file encrypted field with true or false value
Verify the GCS properties of encryption metadata file suffix field
Verify the GCS properties of File system properties field which is Additional properties to use with the InputFormat when reading the data
Verify the GCS properties of File encoding field(UTF-8)
Verify the maximum split size for each partion in bytes in Advance GCS properties
Verify the minimum split size for each partion in bytes in Advance GCS properties
